sentences.sContent: Scientists have taken their first, vicarious journey to the center of the moon, thanks to a fresh look at 30-year-old moonquake data from the Apollo era.
sentences.sContent_eng: Scientists have taken their first, vicarious journey to the center of the moon, thanks to a fresh look at 30-year-old moonquake data from the Apollo era.
sentences.sCn: 科学家们由于重新审视了从阿波罗时代就开始已有30年历史的月震数据，才能使他们取得了第一次到月亮中心的替代旅行。

sentences.sContent: It is in Paul's letters that we first find the doctrines of Christ's divinity and vicarious atonement (the Gospels would be written later, when Paul's ideas had become prevalent among Christians).
sentences.sContent_eng: It is in Paul's letters that we first find the doctrines of Christ's divinity and vicarious atonement (the Gospels would be written later, when Paul's ideas had become prevalent among Christians).
sentences.sCn: 我们是在保罗的信中首次发现基督的神性和替代赎罪的（福音书是保罗的观念在基督徒间广为流传后写的）教义。

synos.tran: 替代的；代理的；发同感的

words.tran: 代理的；教区牧师的；代理教区牧师职务的
代理地，担任代理者地；间接感受到地
教区牧师，教堂牧师；传教牧师；代理人

trans.tranOther: experienced by watching or reading about someone else doing something, rather than by doing it yourself
